FishingLocationFeature.Title: Hot
FishingLocationFeature.Description: Casting the rod will consume two stamina.

FishingLocationFeature.Title: Strong Fish
FishingLocationFeature.Description: All fish get 50% bonus to its strength.

FishingLocationFeature.Title: Well Fed Fish
FishingLocationFeature.Description: Without fishfinder waiting time is doubled.

ShareTemplate.Name: I’ve completed a challenge!
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!
ShareTemplate.Description: Awesome, I completed the {0} challenge and unlocked some cool new stuff for my tackle box.

ShareTemplate.Name: I’ve won a prize in a tournament!
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!
ShareTemplate.Description: I got {1} place in the {0} and won some cool prizes! Have you got what it takes to win?

ShareTemplate.Name: I’ve won a prize in the everyday lottery
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!
ShareTemplate.Description: The prizes keep getting better each day. Play today there’s plenty more prizes to be won!

ShareTemplate.Name: I've gone up a level
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!
ShareTemplate.Description: I've reached level {0} and unlocked cool new stuff for my tackle box!

ShareTemplate.Name: I've caught a trophy fish!
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!
ShareTemplate.Description: Awesome, I landed a {1} {0}!!! What an epic fight it was! Can you do better?

ShareTemplate.Name: I've caught a new record fish!
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!
ShareTemplate.Description: I landed a {1} {0}!!! What a great fight it was! Can you catch a bigger one?

ShareTemplate.Name: I've caught a legendary fish!
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!

ShareTemplate.Name: I've completed a fish collection!
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!
ShareTemplate.Description: I’ve stocked my lake full of {0} species and completed a collection. Can you catch them all?

ShareTemplate.Name: I've completed a loot collection
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!
ShareTemplate.Description: I have completed the {0} collection. It’s amazing what treasures you can find at the bottom of the ocean!

ShareTemplate.Name: I've bought a lake for my fishery
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!
ShareTemplate.Description: I’ve added a new {0} to my fishery, fish with me and build your own Fishing Paradise!

ShareTemplate.Name: I've got a new sponsor!
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!
ShareTemplate.Description: Great, all that hard work is starting to pay off! I’m now the face of {0}. Sponsors unlock exclusive stuff that will help give me the edge in competitions.

ShareTemplate.Name: I've won a record competition!
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!
ShareTemplate.Description: I just took {3} place in my friend {0}'s {1} competition! Can you beat it!?

ShareTemplate.Name: Check out my leader board!
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!

ShareTemplate.Name: Check out my friends leader board!
ShareTemplate.Caption: Fishing Paradise 3D, the most addictive fishing game on Facebook. Play now, get hooked!

RequestTemplate.Message: You wont believe how addictive this game is. Join millions of players already hooked! Check it out!

Quest.Name: Welcome
Quest.Description: Hi, I’m your guide Mike D, but you might know me as the Mike D! Welcome to Fishing Paradise.

Quest.Name: Welcome
Quest.Description: Before you embark on a global fishing adventure, i’ll describe the game basics in this short tutorial...

Quest.Name: Catching a fish
Quest.Description: Cast your rod by pressing "Cast" button.

Quest.Name: Become a Pro
Quest.Description: Unlucky that one got away, don't worry every fisherman has this tale to tell! Keep going.

Quest.Name: Fishing tutorial
Quest.Description: The green bar is the strength of the fish. The bigger the fish, the harder the fight.

Quest.Name: Fishing tutorial
Quest.Description: Some fish are more aggressive and will fight more than others, the bar will turn red when a fish is fighting hard.

Quest.Name: Fishing tutorial
Quest.Description: The blue bar is the line tension. Watch the line tension meter, if it goes too far your line will snap and the fish will escape.

Quest.Name: Fishing tutorial
Quest.Description: When the fish is fighting or the line tension gets too high, let go of the reel and let the line spool out a bit.

Quest.Name: Fishing tutorial
Quest.Description: Start reeling in once the tension has dropped or the fish has stopped fighting.

Quest.Name: Fishing tutorial
Quest.Description: To do this, hold the reel and rotate in a clockwise direction.

Quest.Name: Fishing tutorial
Quest.Description: You can sell your catch for coins but I hope you fish like me and prefer to turn them loose!

Quest.Name: Catching a fish
Quest.Description: Your a natural! Try a few more casts and get a feel for your reel.

Quest.Name: Become a Pro
Quest.Description: So you want to be a professional fisherman? If you can get a sponsor you can use all their latest tackle.

Quest.Name: Become a Pro
Quest.Description: Not everyone can make pro, it takes lots of hard work and dedication, still think you’ve got what it takes?

Quest.Name: Get coins
Quest.Description: You won’t catch a monster with that old rod and reel! You’re going to need some better equipment.

Quest.Name: Get coins
Quest.Description: You can work at my new site. I could use the extra help and you can earn some extra coins along the way.

Quest.Name: Goto Site
Quest.Description: Tap on the "house" button to return home.

Quest.Name: Site
Quest.Description: This is the site. By stocking each lake and creating buildings were going to make this a Fishing Paradise!

Quest.Name: Catch more trophies
Quest.Description: Nice, you just caught your 1st trophy fish. A moment in fishing you never forget! Keep going.

Quest.Name: Transition
Quest.Description: If you see this text in the game, report a bug.

Quest.Name: Money earned
Quest.Description: You still think you’ve got what it takes to turn pro? Now you’ve earned some money why not buy some new equipment?

Quest.Name: Buy new tackle
Quest.Description: You can buy new tackle at the shop. It is divided into several folders, each contain items of a certain category.

Quest.Name: Buy new tackle
Quest.Description: Look in the “tackle” folder. Green items are available to buy. Red items are currently locked.

Quest.Name: Buy new tackle
Quest.Description: Earn coins, invite friends, complete challenges and gain xp to unlock better tackle.

Quest.Name: Sell old tackle
Quest.Description: There is no point carrying all that old tackle around with you! Old items can be resold.

Quest.Name: Tackle bag
Quest.Description: You can find all tackle in your inventory. Make sure you are well equipped before you go fishing.

Quest.Name: Tackle bag
Quest.Description: To equip tackle tap “Use” then “Equip” button. Equipped items are highlighted yellow.

Quest.Name: Transition
Quest.Description: If you see this text in the game, report a bug.

Quest.Name: Try new equipment
Quest.Description: Better tackle allows you to target bigger and rarer species. Why don’t you test your new equipment?

Quest.Name: Try new equipment
Quest.Description: Tap on the "Map" icon in the bottom right corner and travel to Lake Michigan in the United States.

Quest.Name: Try new equipment
Quest.Description: Catch 5 fish at Lake Michigan.

Quest.Name: Stamina is low
Quest.Description: When you cast the rod, you lose 1 stamina. Stamina will restore over time back to your maximum.

Quest.Name: Get new hat
Quest.Description: Buy new clothes to increase your max stamina.

Quest.Name: Transition
Quest.Description: If you see this text in the game, report a bug.

Quest.Name: Ready for tournament
Quest.Description: I see your fishing skills are improving; you should enter yourself in a local tournament.

Quest.Name: Ready for tournament
Quest.Description: Tournaments let you test your skills against other fishermen around the world for prizes!

Quest.Name: Win the tournament
Quest.Description: Return to the site and select map again. You will find tournaments in the location description.

Quest.Name: Transition
Quest.Description: If you see this text in the game, report a bug.

Quest.Name: Gift from Mike D
Quest.Description: Your a great help around the site and I’m not as young as I used to be.

Quest.Name: Gift from Mike D
Quest.Description: I can’t manage all my sites so I’m entrusting one to you. I know it’s in safe hands.

Quest.Name: Your site
Quest.Description: Start by working on the small pond, gain more experience to unlock larger lakes and keep rarer fish.

Quest.Name: Your site
Quest.Description: Your site has numerous places for different buildings. Buildings have unique features.

Quest.Name: Construct new buildings
Quest.Description: Some generate income, bait and unlock features to make your site attractive to fishermen.

Quest.Name: Construct new buildings
Quest.Description: Green buildings are available to buy. Red buildings are currently locked.

Quest.Name: Construct new buildings
Quest.Description: Earn coins, invite friends, complete challenges and gain xp to unlock new buildings.

Quest.Name: Collect coins
Quest.Description: You can tap on any object to interact. Now tap on a building to collect coins from it.

Quest.Name: Transition
Quest.Description: If you see this text in the game, report a bug.

Quest.Name: Visit Mike D
Quest.Description: Please come and visit my site, I've got some awesome things to show you!

Quest.Name: Visit Mike D
Quest.Description: You can visit your friends by tapping on their portrait picture.

Quest.Name: Transition
Quest.Description: If you see this text in the game, report a bug.

Quest.Name: Friend’s Fishery
Quest.Description: You can fish a friend’s lake if it has at least one complete fish collection.

Quest.Name: Standard friend visited
Quest.Description: Please report a bug if you see this text

Quest.Name: Record competitions
Quest.Description: I’m holding competitions between visitors to my site.

Quest.Name: Record competitions
Quest.Description: Each competition has a record table. Ranking number one in a record table earns you every day reward.

Quest.Name: Join Record competition
Quest.Description: Tap on a record building and take part in a competition

Quest.Name: Record competitions
Quest.Description: Your friends can hold these competitions as well, visit them and compete!

Quest.Name: Record competitions
Quest.Description: Someday you will be able to hold these competitions on your own site.

Quest.Name: Record tutorial completed
Quest.Description: Please report a bug if you see this text

Quest.Name: Invite friends
Quest.Description: Fishing is fun, but fishing with friends is better. Why not invite friends to the game?

Quest.Name: Invite new friend
Quest.Description: With new neighbors you’ll get access to additional stuff.

Quest.Name: Transition
Quest.Description: If you see this text in the game, report a bug.

Quest.Name: Collect coins
Quest.Description: Collect coins from new buildings.

Quest.Name: Earn coins
Quest.Description: Earn more coins.

Quest.Name: Low energy
Quest.Description: Energy is like stamina, but used for different tasks on your site. Some buildings increase max energy.

Quest.Name: Energy buildings
Quest.Description: Build 2 hotdog stands and increase maximum energy

Quest.Name: Tackle Broken
Quest.Description: Your tackle’s broken. This can happen fighting big fish. Don't worry, anything can be repaired.

Quest.Name: Fix item
Quest.Description: Open inventory, tap "use" button and select fix option. Repairing an item costs coins.

Quest.Name: Selling broken items
Quest.Description: If you don't need the broken item anymore, You can always sell it.

Quest.Name: Transition
Quest.Description: If you see this text in the game, report a bug.

Quest.Name: Bait
Quest.Description: Remember to try different baits. Each bait attracts its own set of fish species.

Quest.Name: Bait
Quest.Description: Bread is good for Trout. The bigger the fish, the more picky they are when it comes to bait.

Quest.Name: Bait
Quest.Description: During fishing you can tap on a bait icon to change it.

Quest.Name: Bait
Quest.Description: You can tap on a bait in the inventory to see what it catches.

Quest.Name: Baits
Quest.Description: Some baits can be produced in special buildings. Add some of these buildings.

Quest.Name: Bait collecting
Quest.Description: Collect insects and catch some fish on it.

Quest.Name: New tackle
Quest.Description: Don't forget to upgrade when new tackle becomes available.

Quest.Name: New location
Quest.Description: A new location is available - Castaic Lake. To travel here you need to own some transport.

Quest.Name: Buy bicycle
Quest.Description: Buy a bicycle in the property folder in the shop and travel to Castaic Lake.

Quest.Name: Very hot
Quest.Description: Scorchio! The weather is very hot here - Tap on the "sun" icon at the top right corner.

Quest.Name: Very hot
Quest.Description: You should protect yourself by purchasing an umbrella in the property folder in the shop.

Quest.Name: Collect coins
Quest.Description: Collect coins from buildings.

Quest.Name: Chum
Quest.Description: It’s time to teach you some tricks. Use fish chum to attract certain species to your swim.

Quest.Name: Chum
Quest.Description: You can find chums in the consumables folder in the shop. Try it now.

Quest.Name: Lures
Quest.Description: Lures are for predatory fish. Unlike baits, lures are not consumed during ordinary fishing.

Quest.Name: Lures
Quest.Description: Be careful, lures can be lost if you lose a fight to a big fish!

Quest.Name: Spoon lure
Quest.Description: Try a spoon lure. It’s one of my favorite lures and good for catching a variety of species.

Quest.Name: Loot found
Quest.Description: That’s not a fish! Someone must have lost it in the water.

Quest.Name: Collections
Quest.Description: You should build a Lost&Found office. You can store all loot items there.

Quest.Name: Customers
Quest.Description: Ready for more customers? Build some recreational buildings so they will visit your site.

Quest.Name: Customers
Quest.Description: These buildings increase total number of customers. Now build 2 toilets.

Quest.Name: Transition
Quest.Description: If you see this text in the game, report a bug.

Quest.Name: Selling buildings
Quest.Description: Sometimes you need to develop new buildings to replace old ones.

Quest.Name: Selling buildings
Quest.Description: You can sell an old building by selecting the sell button at the bottom left corner and tap on the building you wish to sell.

Quest.Name: New buildings
Quest.Description: Sell all pegs. Build 2 double pegs and 2 huts.

Quest.Name: New bait and lure
Quest.Description: Nightcrawlers are good for many species. It’s a great bait for catching Walleye.

Quest.Name: New bait and lure
Quest.Description: Plastic worms are great for catching Bass.

Quest.Name: Transition
Quest.Description: If you see this text in the game, report a bug.

Quest.Name: Advanced tournaments
Quest.Description: Advanced tournaments have better prizes than basic ones, but have a countdown timer as well.

Quest.Name: Advanced tournaments
Quest.Description: Try yourself in advanced tournaments.

Quest.Name: Hard roe
Quest.Description: Some female fish have hard roe. Try to catch these fish.

CatchFishesQC.Description: Catch a fish carrying hard roe

Quest.Name: Fish breeding
Quest.Description: You have enough experience to start breeding fish in your lake. Diversity of fish species attracts better customers.

Quest.Name: Fish breeding
Quest.Description: To start breeding fish, build a breeding pond near your small pond.

Quest.Name: Fish breeding
Quest.Description: Once finished. Tap on the small pond and add White Crappie to it.

FishSpeciesAmountQC.Description: Add White Crappie to small pond

Quest.Name: Fish species
Quest.Description: Good. Now wait until they have finished breeding.

Quest.Name: Attraction
Quest.Description: The Crappies have grown and it’s now a common species in your pond.

Quest.Name: Attraction
Quest.Description: Tap on the small pond to see how it increases your sites attraction level.

Quest.Name: Swimbait lure
Quest.Description: Swimbait is good for Walleye and other medium sized freshwater fish.

Quest.Name: Michigan festival
Quest.Description: Try yourself out in the Michigan Festival. Festivals greatly increase the reputation of the winner.

Quest.Name: Sponsors
Quest.Description: You’ve got your first sponsor! Raise your reputation and get another sponsor with new stuff.

Quest.Name: Fish habitat
Quest.Description: Each lakes environment is suited for certain species, fish stock is limited by each lakes capacity.

Quest.Name: Buying Fish
Quest.Description: You can buy some fish in the shop. But others must be caught in the wild.

Quest.Name: Fish collections
Quest.Description: Certain species thrive together. This means great fishing and increases the attraction level of the lake.

Quest.Name: Fish collections
Quest.Description: Now complete the “small” collection.

FishSpeciesAmountQC.Description: Add black Crappie to your pond

Quest.Name: Fish collections
Quest.Description: You should target species to form collections. Or target specimens with high attraction value.

Quest.Name: Everglades
Quest.Description: Visit the Everglades and find out what fish live there. The Everglades is full of snakes and crocs, better invite a friend...

CatchFishesQC.Description: Catch a trophy fish at Everglades

Quest.Name: Crayfish bait
Quest.Description: I’ve caught plenty of Bass with this bait!

Quest.Name: Target certain species
Quest.Description: A good way to target certain species is to use a fishfinder. You can buy one in the consumables folder in the shop.

Quest.Name: Fishfinder
Quest.Description: If you cast while a certain fish is displayed on a fishfinder's screen, you increase your chances of catching it.

Quest.Name: Fishfinder
Quest.Description: Now, catch some Bass using Crayfish and your new fishfinder.

Quest.Name: Invitations
Quest.Description: Some tournaments require a special invitation.

Quest.Name: Castaic Cup
Quest.Description: Get that invitation by winning Castaic Classic tournament. Then, join and win Castaic Cup.

GetInvitationQC.Description: Get invitation to Pro Castaic tournament

Quest.Name: Collect coins
Quest.Description: Collect coins from buildings.

Quest.Name: New customers
Quest.Description: Great! You now have Pro’s fishing here. Make more profit.

Quest.Name: Light Equipment
Quest.Description: Get new equipment and catch a bigger fish.

Quest.Name: New lake
Quest.Description: You can buy new lake now. Each lake can have its own set of fish. Select a small lake and buy it.

Quest.Name: More buildings
Quest.Description: New lakes contain new places for buildings. Add new buildings to generate more income.

Quest.Name: Medium fish species
Quest.Description: Complete medium fish collection in the new lake.

Quest.Name: Saltwater location
Quest.Description: Saltwater fish are different to freshwater, and they are larger! Try a new experience in Nassau.

Quest.Name: Squid bait
Quest.Description: Squid is a saltwater bait. It’s suitable for saltwater species.

Quest.Name: Jig lure
Quest.Description: A Jig is good in both saltwater and freshwater. It’s very good for Bonefish!

Quest.Name: Travel to Nassau
Quest.Description: Travel to Nassau and catch your first saltwater fish.

Quest.Name: Raise reputation
Quest.Description: I heard your name mentioned in the club house. Keep wining tournaments to enhance your reputation.

Quest.Name: Win Pro Tournament
Quest.Description: Invite more friends and unlock pro tournaments. The most valuable prizes are won there!

Quest.Name: Collect coins
Quest.Description: Collect coins from buildings.

Quest.Name: Earn coins
Quest.Description: Build long piers in your lakes and earn some coins.

Quest.Name: Better fishfinder
Quest.Description: A standard fishfinder is more accurate than a basic one. It’s a good advantage in tournaments.

Quest.Name: Transition
Quest.Description: If you see this text in the game, report a bug.

Quest.Name: Nassau festival
Quest.Description: Catch some trophy fish to be eligible for the Nassau festival.

Quest.Name: Bass hunter
Quest.Description: Show your skills at catching Bass and receive a special gift from the Mike D.

Quest.Name: United Kingdom
Quest.Description: Your now able to travel to UK fishing locations. See unlocked countries on the world map.

Quest.Name: Loch Ness
Quest.Description: Cold weather is expected at Loch Ness. You should prepare for it before you travel.

Quest.Name: Maggot bait
Quest.Description: Want to catch some new species in the UK? Try using maggots.

Quest.Name: Collect coins
Quest.Description: Collect coins from buildings.

Quest.Name: Upgrade
Quest.Description: Don't forget to upgrade your site's buildings.

Quest.Name: Advanced rods
Quest.Description: Advanced rods are lighter and stronger. This allows you to cast further and hunt larger species.

Quest.Name: Advanced rods
Quest.Description: Why don’t you revisit some earlier locations and try to beat some records?

BuyInventoryQC.Description: Buy a ultra light advanced rod

Quest.Name: Crankbait lure
Quest.Description: Crankbaits are good for many freshwater fish and even some saltwater fish. It’s especially good at catching Northern Pike.

Quest.Name: Bass breeding
Quest.Description: You can have one of my Paradise Reels if you complete a bass collection in one of your lakes.

Quest.Name: Further breeding
Quest.Description: Through breeding, you can increase fish population in your lakes and produce fish stock.

Quest.Name: Further breeding
Quest.Description: Breeding costs both time and coins. Add a fish farm to the Large pond.

Quest.Name: Further breeding
Quest.Description: When complete,“fish stock” can be randomly produced when collecting coins from nearby buildings.

Quest.Name: Fish farm
Quest.Description: Start breeding by tapping on any owned lake and then tapping the breed button on your chosen fish.

HasBuildingQC.Description: Build fish farm at Large pond

FishSpeciesAmountQC.Description: Breed any species to abundant quantity

Quest.Name: Fish stock
Quest.Description: You’ve got some fish stock. You can sell it to gain additional profit.

Quest.Name: Fish stock
Quest.Description: Rare fish are very profitable and we help to improve fish populations around the world.

Quest.Name: Wobbler Lure
Quest.Description: Wobbler lure’s suitable for some large freshwater species and few saltwater species.

Quest.Name: Small baitfish
Quest.Description: Small baitfish are good for various small and medium predatory saltwater fish.

Quest.Name: Get more customers
Quest.Description: Add some tackle shops to increase customer numbers.

Quest.Name: Large Lake
Quest.Description: This lake is large enough to hold bigger buildings. Buy it and add a boat to travel to the far island.

Quest.Name: Record Competitions
Quest.Description: You can hold competitions for your friends. You will receive a reward for hosting the competition.

Quest.Name: Record Competitions
Quest.Description: Please note competition will only be held in the lake you built your record building on.

Quest.Name: Record Competitions
Quest.Description: Add a record competition building and invite a friend. When someone sets a record you can collect the prize.

CollectFromBuildingsQC.Description: Have a friend set a record and collect prize

Quest.Name: Other sports
Quest.Description: There is a better chance of catching loot items in the UK. There may be stuff from the Olympics in the Thames.

CatchLootQC.Description: Catch 10 loot items at River Thames

Quest.Name: Luncheon Meat
Quest.Description: This bait is good for fish species in the UK, especially Chub.

Quest.Name: Trolling Lure
Quest.Description: This is a saltwater lure. Good for various fish. Very good for Dorado.

CatchFishesQC.Description: Catch a Chub with hard roe

Quest.Name: Raise attraction
Quest.Description: Get more customers by raising the attraction level of your site.

FishSpeciesAmountQC.Description: Have Muskie species in your lakes

Quest.Name: Lunkerville Challenge
Quest.Description: Hi I'm Mike D from South Bends Lunkerville, the award winning reality fishing show.

Quest.Name: Lunkerville Challenge
Quest.Description: Im looking for a guide and location to shoot my new series and rumor has it your site holds some Lunkers!

Quest.Name: Lunkerville Challenge
Quest.Description: How about I set you some challenges so you can show me what you got?

Quest.Name: Lunkerville Challenge
Quest.Description: Catch 10 trophy largemouth Bass

Quest.Name: Lunkerville Challenge
Quest.Description: Catch a fish at least 100lb weight.

CatchFishesQC.Description: Catch a fish at least 100lb weight

Quest.Name: Lunkerville Challenge
Quest.Description: Catch trophy White Marlin

Quest.Name: Lunkerville Challenge
Quest.Description: At Lunkerville we catch real people with real fish stories, do you have a few fishing buddies we can fish with?

Quest.Name: Lunkerville Challenge
Quest.Description: Have 3 friends compete on your site

FriendCompetitonResultQC.Description: Have 3 friends compete on your site

Quest.Name: Lunkerville Challenge
Quest.Description: Hold 1st place on 3 friends competitions

CompetitonResultQC.Description: Hold 1st place on 3 friends record competitions

Quest.Name: Lunkerville Challenge
Quest.Description: Awesome man! You smashed those challenges and your sites a Fishing Paradise!

Quest.Name: Lunkerville Challenge
Quest.Description: I've had a blast and seen some real Lunkers! I'd love to shoot my new series here!

Quest.Name: Larger boats
Quest.Description: Build small boats in your lakes.

Quest.Name: Soft Plastic Lure
Quest.Description: Good for vast number of both freshwater and saltwater species.

Quest.Name: Cut fish bait
Quest.Description: Good for medium and big saltwater fish. Try to use it for catching Grouper.

CatchFishesQC.Description: Catch a Grouper with hard roe

Quest.Name: Texas festival
Quest.Description: Add new trophies to your records to unlock Texas pro tournament.

Quest.Name: Growing reputation
Quest.Description: You should continue to compete in different tournaments.

Quest.Name: Corn bait
Quest.Description: Freshwater bait, popular for catching Carp.

CatchFishesQC.Description: Catch a Common Carp with hard roe

Quest.Name: Fish lab
Quest.Description: A Fish lab allows you to remove fish from your lakes. You may need to do this when creating space for collections.

HasBuildingQC.Description: Build a fish lab near large lake

RemoveFishFromLakeQC.Description: Remove Roach from the large pond

Quest.Name: Trophy Bass
Quest.Description: Your still way off my 800 trophy Bass record! Catch some more trophy bass and i’ll let you try my cool Paradise Reel.

CatchFishesQC.Description: Catch Peacock Bass with hard roe

Quest.Name: Improve skills
Quest.Description: Improve your personal record with at least a 40lb fish.

Quest.Name: Customer request
Quest.Description: Some customers will ask you to add new lake trips and new fish species to your lakes.

Quest.Name: Make a profit
Quest.Description: Build small cottages for your customers and collect more coins.

Quest.Name: Heavy tackle
Quest.Description: With heavy tackle, you can land big saltwater fish.

Quest.Name: Heavy tackle
Quest.Description: Find trophy Sailfish in Nassau and huge Tuna in Texas. Or hunt for both in Hawaii.

Quest.Name: Bighead carp
Quest.Description: We have a problem with invasive species in the US. I’ve been asked if we can catch some Bighead Carp at Everglades.

CatchFishesQC.Description: Catch Bighead Carp with hard roe

Quest.Name: Thailand
Quest.Description: You can travel to Thailand. Its rivers hold very rare fish that can be only found there.

Quest.Name: Mekong river
Quest.Description: Explore the tropical jungle and find out what exotic species hide in the murky waters of the Mekong river.

Quest.Name: Tropical Lure
Quest.Description: Tropical fish do not like lures much. But tropical surface lures can attract Giant Snakehead and Barramundi.

Quest.Name: Frog bait
Quest.Description: Frogs are good bait for tropical fish, but not only tropical species likes frogs. Bass and Catfish can be caught on frogs.

Quest.Name: Rare species
Quest.Description: Add some rare tropical species to your trophy collection.

Quest.Name: Tropical lake
Quest.Description: With the help of modern technology you can keep tropical species in your lakes.

Quest.Name: Tropical Lake
Quest.Description: Buy small tropical lake and breed some tropical species.

AddFishToLakeQC.Description: Add any fish to small tropical lake

Quest.Name: Get more coins
Quest.Description: If you need more space for large buildings, buy a new lake.

Quest.Name: Treasure
Quest.Description: There’s not only useless junk to be found in deep water. Some valuable treasures are hidden down there.

Quest.Name: Minnow lure
Quest.Description: This lure can bring you medium tropical fish.

Quest.Name: Fruit bait
Quest.Description: If you want to target Pacu and nothing more - use fruit!

Quest.Name: New Challenge
Quest.Description: You can be the 1st person to test my latest prototype Paradise Reel if you can complete my fishing challenge...

Quest.Name: New Challenge
Quest.Description: Catch a fish weighing at least 70lb, catch Giant Snakehead with hard roe, complete big and common fish collection.

CatchFishesQC.Description: Catch Giant Snakehead with hard roe

Quest.Name: Catching tarpon
Quest.Description: To catch Tarpon you need tackle that could land an 80 lb fish.

Quest.Name: Catching tarpon
Quest.Description: Tarpon are great sport, you’ll find plenty in the Everglades, you should visit.

HasInInventoryQC.Description: Buy an ultra heavy standard rod

Quest.Name: Pellet bait
Quest.Description: Pellets are a bait for catching Catfish. But it also can attract Carp.

Quest.Name: Phuket festival
Quest.Description: More trophies and catching a legendary Arapaima will allow you to compete in the Phuket festival.

Quest.Name: Expand service
Quest.Description: Buy a luxury yacht for your big lakes and build cottages to provide a new level of service.

Quest.Name: Saltwater lake
Quest.Description: At last, you can have saltwater species at your site. Complete saltwater collection and breed a lot of Bonefish.

Quest.Name: Australia
Quest.Description: Travel to Australia and experience challenging saltwater fishing.

Quest.Name: Teaser lure
Quest.Description: Teaser lures are good for large saltwater species, especially for rare White Marlins.

Quest.Name: Teaser lure
Quest.Description: They’ve been found at both Texas coast and Hawaii.

Quest.Name: Parks
Quest.Description: Upgrade your tackle shops and build a park. It will bring many new customers to your site.

Quest.Name: Mackerel bait
Quest.Description: Want to catch a Great White? Use Mackerel bait. It’s good for other large saltwater fish too.

Quest.Name: Exmouth festival
Quest.Description: If you never catch a trophy Shark, there is nothing for you at the Exmouth festival.

Quest.Name: Big profit
Quest.Description: Add some fast boats to your lakes and make some profit.

Quest.Name: Marlin
Quest.Description: It is a real challenge to catch a Marlin. You will need the best equipment, excellent skill and a bit of luck!

Quest.Name: Hammerhead Shark
Quest.Description: Unlike most sharks, hammerheads usually swim in schools during the day, becoming solitary hunters at night.

Quest.Name: Australia battle
Quest.Description: Win three prestigious Australian tournaments.

Quest.Name: Luxury
Quest.Description: Build some luxurious places for your professional customers.

Quest.Name: Congo river
Quest.Description: A new location is available - Congo river. To travel here you need to own a plane.

Quest.Name: Congo adventure
Quest.Description: Buy a plane and travel to Congo river.

CatchFishesQC.Description: Catch a Trophy Goliath Tiger Fish

Quest.Name: Congo nature
Quest.Description: Try a Chicken livers and catch Vundu in Congo river.

Quest.Name: Congo Festival
Quest.Description: Win one of the toughest tournaments in the world - Congo Festival!

Quest.Name: Alaska
Quest.Description: Alaska's lakes are teeming with record breaking Salmon, Rainbow Trout, beautiful Arctic Char, Halibut and many other challenging sport fish.

Quest.Name: Visit Alaska
Quest.Description: Visit Alaska, dont forget your coat!

Quest.Name: Arctic Grayling
Quest.Description: The Arctic grayling is one of the most beautiful freshwater fishes of Alaska.

Quest.Name: Alaska Festival
Quest.Description: The local Alaksa fishing Festival attracts some of the best Salmon fishermen from around the globe.

Quest.Name: Amazon River
Quest.Description: The Amazon River is the largest river in the world, home to some of the most exotic and notorious fish known to man which makes for awesome fishing!

Quest.Name: Amazon River
Quest.Description: Visit Amazon River, be careful and dont fall in the River!

Quest.Name: Golden Dorado
Quest.Description: With jaws like bolt cutters, the Golden Dorado is one sleek, bloodthirsty, river monster.

Quest.Name: Amazon Cup
Quest.Description: The Amazon Cup is a trophy owned by few and wanted by many.

Quest.Name: Amazon Collection
Quest.Description: Complete "Amazon" Collection

Quest.Name: Final challenge
Quest.Description: You are one step away from becoming a legendary champion.

Quest.Name: Final challenge
Quest.Description: Will you have legendary fish in your lakes? Will you catch monster fish? Will you become a world champion?

Quest.Name: CCA Competition
Quest.Description: The Coastal Conservation Association has tagged a bunch of redfish and set them free. Can you catch 20?

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch 20 tagged redfish for the CCA competition!

Quest.Name: Lake Trout
Quest.Description: Lake Trout are common to the lakes of North America. Go catch 10 of them!

Quest.Name: Trophy Lake Trout
Quest.Description: Catch 3 Trophy Lake Trout to show off your fishing skill!

Quest.Name: Redfish
Quest.Description: Redfish are commonly found in the salt bays of North America. Go catch some!

Quest.Name: Trophy Redfish
Quest.Description: Catch a few trophy Redfish to demonstrate your skills!

Quest.Name: Coelacanth
Quest.Description: Coelacanth are some of the world's oldest and rarest fish. Go see if you can find some!

Quest.Name: Trophy Coelacanth
Quest.Description: You've caught a trophy Coelacanth before. See if you can do it a few more times!

Quest.Name: Big Bill
Quest.Description: Big Bill is a legendary largemouth I caught once fishing in the Everglades. I wonder how big he is now?

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Big Bill in Everglades

Quest.Name: Prince
Quest.Description: Barbels are majestic fish. There's a real beauty somewhere in the Thames they call Prince.

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Prince in Thames

Quest.Name: Pluto
Quest.Description: Pluto the common carp's so elusive he hasn't been caught in a few years. He knows every trick in the book!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Pluto in Butterley

Quest.Name: Nessie
Quest.Description: NEWSFLASH! A tourist reports a sighting of a monster in Loch Ness!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Northern Pike "Nessie" at Loch Ness

Quest.Name: Sharptooth
Quest.Description: A shark has been seen swimming dangerously close to the Island; the newspapers are calling him "Sharptooth".

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Sharptooth in Lizard Island

Quest.Name: Bony
Quest.Description: There's a monster Arapaima the locals nicknamed "Bony" after his armour like scales.

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Bony in Mekong River

Quest.Name: Kruger
Quest.Description: The Goliath Tigerfish is one of the most fearsome freshwater fish. There's rumors of a goliath 90lber called Kruger!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Kruger in Congo

Quest.Name: Biggie
Quest.Description: I've seen a dark shadow lurking under the boat, looks a real biggie!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Black Marlin "Biggie" at Lord Howe

Quest.Name: Wally
Quest.Description: Wheres Wally the Walleye? Find him!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary "Wally" at Lake Michegan

Quest.Name: Skippy
Quest.Description: Huge tuna bring in huge coin, catch one and become a legend!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary "Skippy" at Nassau

Quest.Name: Leviathan
Quest.Description: Theres a monster catfish in the lake the local call Leviathan!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Catfish "Leviathan" at Castiac Lake

Quest.Name: Bully
Quest.Description: Find "Bully" and teach that shark a lesson!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Bull Shark "Bully" at Hawaii

Quest.Name: CoCo
Quest.Description: I overheard a fisherman at the bar say they caught "CoCo" yesterday, I think he had one too many!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Coho Salmon "CoCo" at Alaska

Quest.Name: Thornback
Quest.Description: Be careful hunting "Thornback" he has a huge sting in his tail and isn't afraid to use it!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Giant Stingray "Thornback" at Mekong

Quest.Name: Dracula
Quest.Description: A Paraya in this stretch of the river has teeth so big the locals call him "Dracula"!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Payara "Dracula" at Amazon

Quest.Name: Bluey
Quest.Description: A young fisherman once caught a monster Blue Marlin and nicknamed him "Bluey"!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Blue Marlin "Bluey" at Phuket

Quest.Name: Tilly
Quest.Description: "Tilly's" a huge female Tarpon, be careful she's a big old girl!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Tarpon "Tilly" at Texas Coast

Quest.Name: Lucky Larry
Quest.Description: Catching "Lucky Larry" is said to bring a fisherman unprecedented amounts of luck!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Lake Trout "Lucky Larry" at Lake Michigan

Quest.Name: Rufus
Quest.Description: "Rufus" is a small, but mighty Roach that has eluded fishermen for years!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Roach "Rufus" at Butterley Reservoir

Quest.Name: Sledge
Quest.Description: "Sledge" is a fearsome shark that uses his head as a battering ram to incapacitate his prey!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Hammerhead Shark "Sledge" at Exmouth

Quest.Name: Venom
Quest.Description: "Venom" is a nasty snakehead that has a mouthful of deadly bacteria!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Giant Snakehead "Venom" in the Mekong River

Quest.Name: Gladius
Quest.Description: "Gladius" is no stranger to battle! Beware of his deadly bill.

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Swordfish "Gladius" in the Texas Gulf Coast

Quest.Name: Colossus
Quest.Description: A true monster of unthinkable size! "Colossus" will be a true test of might.

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Coelacanth "Colossus" in the Congo

Quest.Name: Gargantuan
Quest.Description: "Gargantuan" has all the qualities of a real dinosaur! As strong as he is large.

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Alligator Gar "Gargantuan" in the Texas Gulf Coast

Quest.Name: Crazy Red
Quest.Description: Crazy Red is a legendary redfish. Luckily, he's not TOO difficult to find! Catching him is another story, however.

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Crazy Red in Key West

Quest.Name: Lineside
Quest.Description: Elusive and explosive, "Lineside" lurks in the shadows to ambush prey!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Snook "Lineside" in the Everglades

Quest.Name: Deep Blue
Quest.Description: "Deep Blue" hangs out in amazing depths searching for prey!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Bluefin Tuna "Deep Blue" in the Texas Gulf Coast

Quest.Name: Strut
Quest.Description: Making graceful leaps, "Strut" shows his colors in full force!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Peacock Bass "Strut" in the Amazon River

Quest.Name: Turbo
Quest.Description: "Turbo" hits his target with the speed of a train!

FishWasCaughtQC.Description: Catch the legendary Giant Trevally "Turbo" in Hawaii

Country.Name: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
